code: import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import{observer}from"mobx-react-lite";import{Context}from"../index";import{fetchCategories,fetchQuestions}from"../http/questionAPI";import QuestionItem from"../components/QuestionItem";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Questions=observer(function(){var _useContext=useContext(Context),question=_useContext.question;useEffect(function(){fetchCategories().then(function(data){return question.setCategories(data);});fetchQuestions().then(function(data){return question.setQuestions(data.rows);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:question.categories.map(function(category){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:category.name});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-sm-5 col-md-6 col-12 pb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Questions"}),question.questions.map(function(qn){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuestionItem,{question:qn},qn.id);})]})})})]});});export default Questions;
